author: Lounge
install_msg: Thanks for installing the ModWhitelist cog! Use [p]help ModWhitelist to see all commands.
name: ModWhitelist
short: Whitelist channels to exclude them from bot moderation
description: Allows server owners to whitelist specific channels, preventing the bot from performing moderation actions like message deletion in those channels.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores Discord channel IDs for whitelisted channels in the bot's configuration.
